title: Discussion References
description: How to get list of discussions attached to a person.

            <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/12345/discussion-references/67890" rel="discussion-reference" title="Person Discussion Reference"/>
        </fs:discussion-reference>
        <fs:discussion-reference resource="https://familysearch.org/platform/discussions/discussions/67891">
            <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/12345/discussion-references/67891" rel="discussion-reference" title="Person Discussion Reference"/>
        </fs:discussion-reference>
        <link href="https://familysearch.org/platform/tree/persons/12345" rel="person" title="Conclusions"/>
    </person>
</fs:familysearch>
